author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Hi all, 

this is the extension of the infrastructure also to be able to readout the tau anti-electron discriminator from existing miniAOD event content on the final analysis level. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15778 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15995 have laid out much of the ground for the current pull request. The current pull request has been announced since we started the overall integration campaign and discussed e.g. in the last RECO/AT meeting (*).

The following changes are only small modifications to files to enable the plugin for readout from pat::Taus:
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/interface/AntiElectronIDMVA6.h
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/src/AntiElectronIDMVA6.cc

The following files have been added to form the new plugin:
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/plugins/PATTauDiscriminationAgainstElectronMVA6.cc
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/python/PATTauDiscriminationAgainstElectronMVA6_cfi.py

The last two files contain modifications that have been made for our internal testing of the new (-> from miniAOD) and old (-> from AOD/standard) readout and to proof in a unit test that both lead to the same output:
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/test/rerunMVAIsolationOnMiniAOD.cc
- RecoTauTag/RecoTau/test/rerunMVAIsolationOnMiniAOD.py 

Similar statements apply as for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15778: the code changes concern code that is run on user level. They are detached from standard reconstruction sequences. In addition this pull request makes use of the infrastructure that has been introduced for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15778. It thus is not as extended as I had thought initially. 

Usual tests have been made and no problems have been spotted. Additional tests that we do internally have been positive. We do not expect any change to the outcome of existing RelVal tests. This PR (for the time being) closes the development cycle we expected for 81X in spring this year. Thanx a lot for the quick integration of the preceding PR's, on which this one relies.

Cheers,
Roger

(*)
https://indico.cern.ch/event/570119/contributions/2305878/attachments/1340889/2019361/TauPOG-2016-09-21-RECO-AT.pdf
title: Extension of infrastructure to readout tau discriminators from miniAOD to anti-electron discriminator
